import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { Row, Container, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import data from "../../data/Trip.json"; import NavbarComp from "../../components/navbar/NavbarComp"; import "./styledet.css"; import res from "../../assets/icons/resort.png"; import air from "../../assets/icons/airplane.png"; import eat from "../../assets/icons/eating.png"; import calend from "../../assets/icons/calendar.png"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { UserContext } from "../../context/Contextusr"; function DetailPage({ match }) { const [state, dispatch] = useContext(UserContext); let history = useHistory(); const datas = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("trip")); const [detail, setDetail] = useState({}); const { id } = match.params; useEffect(() => { let idd = id - 1; setDetail(datas[idd]); }, []); const handleBook = () => { console.log(detail); }; return ( <>

{detail.day}D/{detail?.night}N {detail.title}

{detail?.country}

Acomodation

{detail.date}

); } export default DetailPage;
